I see Betsy DeVos and the GOP are doubling down on their Anti-Everybody agenda by working to cut Fed funding for *the Special Olympics.*

The good news? You elected a House Dem majority, so we can halt it.

Now: who are your favorite disability advocates to follow? Share below  https://twitter.com/TwitterMoments/status/1110670248833769473¬†‚Ä¶

Betsy DeVos faced sharp criticism after unveiling $18 million in proposed cuts to the Special Olympics program, which helps children and adults with disabilities.  https://twitter.com/i/events/1110654109718208512¬†‚Ä¶

I'm disabled with multiple sclerosis. I can't move my right leg I can't even hold a pencil with my right hand.. I use a wheelchair to get around, I can't take my 4 year-old out to play, but I'm in nobody so nobody cares about me, I just don't make a big enough splash.
I didn't make too much of a splash when I first started on Twitter. I tried to find and connect with folks. I told my own story as best I could. We're all doing the best we can with what we have.

I'm certainly doing my best... I am a republican, I'm very opinionated, but most Republicans are hated and belittled into silence.

On top of dealing with my disabilities and illness, the government just kidnapped the oldest of my three kids.

I'm sincerely completely lost. :,(

If you think Republicans are hated, have you tried being anything besides a straight white Christian man in this country?
Full offense but Republicans are resented because they pass heartless legislation that ruin lives. Meanwhile, BIPOC/Jews/LGTBQ+/etc folks are hated for being.

I'm sorry to hear about your kid. Just as I am sorry about every child that's been kidnapped by the US gov't from Indigenous and immigrant families, and every Black kid senselessly murdered by the police. But my empathy doesn't stop and end with white Christians.
Try it sometime.

I had a whole bunch typed up. But you're not worth it. You have to label everything and everyone because you're afraid. You're so racist you pretend you're not and project it on others. I open up to Democrats and you throw insults. You are the definition of hatred and intolerance
which part of what I said did you find offensive?

Your projection of racism on me. You hate me because I'm white Christian male. Have you gone to a black guy and said "try being something other than black". Or said to a gay person "try being something other than gay" why is it okay to say that to me?
